image.title: Pin-Up Girls (January) - DELILAH
image.desc: From a calendar homage to the Pin Up Girls of yesteryear immortalized by Alberto Vargas. Model: KARI (Elmer Olsen) Make-up: KELLY MEREDITH (Judy, Inc.) Hair: TONY CHAAR (Tony Chaar Salon) Wardrobe: ALISA KROST (The Artist Group) and VALERIE OSUMEK

image.title: TONY CHAAR 5TH ANNIVERSARY - Christine
image.desc: The postcard image for Tony's 5th Anniversary Party. A combination of natural media emulation software and watercolours were used to create this effect. Model: CHRISTINE (Elite) Make-up: ANNA LEMAY (Judy, Inc.) and MEREDITH FARLEY (The Artist Group)
